ExpSyntax.val: '&Company='&Trim({32768,99}) &'&DateFrom='&DStr({0,19},'YYYY-MM-DD') &'&DateTo='&DStr({0,20},'YYYY-MM-DD') &'&ParamDate='& CASE({0,18}, 'OPOR','ZZ.[PO Date]', 'OPDN','ZZ.[GRPO Date]', 'OPBL','ZZ.[BL Date]', 'OPCH','ZZ.[Invoice Date]', 'ORPC','ZZ.[CN Date]', 'OVPM','ZZ.[Payment Date]', 'ZZ.[Payment Date]')

{0,24} &'&ParamDocNum=' & CASE({0,18}, 'OPOR','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[PO Number])', 'OPDN','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[GRPO Number])', 'OPBL','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[BL Number])', 'OPCH','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[Invoice Number])', 'ORPC','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[CN Number])', 'OVPM','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[Payment Number])', 'convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[Payment Number])') &'&DocNum=' &Trim({0,23})

SQL_STMT_U.val: select ROW_NUMBER () over (partition by [PO Number] order by [Supplier Code] , [PO Number]) Urut,* from (select case when T0.DocNum is not null then concat('PO-',T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT,'-',cast(T0.DocNum as varchar(10))) else null end as 'PO Number', T0.DocDate as 'PO Date', T0.CardCode as 'Supplier Code', T0.CardName as 'Supplier Name', T0.DocCur as 'Currency', T0.DocTotal as 'Total PO', TA.NumAtCard as 'BL Number', TA.DocDate as 'BL Date', T3.DocNum as 'GRPO Number', T3.DocDate as 'GRPO Date', T3.DocTotal as 'Total GR', TX.U_IDU_Kode_PT as 'Consignee', case when TX.DocNum is not null then concat('INV-',T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT,'-',cast(TX.DocNum as varchar(10))) else null end as 'Invoice Number', TX.DocDate as 'Invoice Date', TX.DocCur as 'Invoice Currency', TX.DocTotal as 'Total Invoice', TY.DocNum as 'CN Number', TY.DocDate as 'CN Date', TY.NumAtCard as 'CN Reference', TY.DocTotal as 'Total CN', Tz.Number_Payment as 'Payment Number', Tz.InvoiceId as 'Sequence', Tz.DocDate as 'Payment Date', TZ.BcgSum as'Bank Charges', TZ.PaidSum as 'Total Payment', (Tx.DocTotal - Tx.PaidToDate) as 'Balance Due' from OPOR as T0 left join (select distinct T1.BaseEntry, T1.DocEntry, T2.ObjType, T2.DocNum, T2.DocDate, T2.NumAtCard, T2.CANCELED, T2.LetterNum from PBL1 as T1 join OPBL as T2 on T1.DocEntry = T2.DocEntry) as TA on T0.DocEntry = TA.BaseEntry and TA.CANCELED = 'N' join TX_DOCREF as TB on TA.DocEntry = TB.BaseEntry and TA.ObjType = TB.BaseType join OPDN as T3 on T3.DocEntry = TB.DocEntry and T3.ObjType = TB.DocType and T3.CANCELED = 'N' right join (select B.BaseEntry, B.BaseType, A.DocEntry, A.ObjType, A.U_IDU_Kode_PT,A.DocNum, A.DocDate, A.DocCur, A.DocTotal, A.PaidToDate from OPCH as A join TX_DOCREF as B on A.DocEntry = B.DocEntry and A.ObjType = B.DocType and A.CANCELED = 'N') as TX on T3.DocEntry = TX.BaseEntry and T3.ObjType = TX.BaseType left join (select B.BaseEntry, B.BaseType, A.DocNum, A.DocEntry, A.ObjType, A.DocDate, A.NumAtCard,A.DocCur, A.DocTotal from ORPC as A join TX_DOCREF as B on A.DocEntry = B.DocEntry and A.ObjType = B.DocType and A.CANCELED = 'N') as TY on TX.DocEntry = TY.BaseEntry and TX.ObjType = TY.BaseType left join (select H.DocNum as 'Number_Payment', H.DocDate, H.DocTotal, H.BcgSum, D.DocNum, D.InvoiceId, D.DocEntry, D.InvType, D.ObjType, D.SumApplied, D.PaidSum from OVPM as H join VPM2 as D on H.DocEntry = D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as TZ on TX.DocEntry = TZ.DocEntry and TX.ObjType = TZ.InvType where T0.CANCELED='N' AND TA.NumAtCard=:4 union select null as 'PO Number', null as 'PO Date', TY.CardCode as 'Supplier Code', TY.CardName as 'Supplier Name', null as 'PO Currency', null as 'Total PO', null as 'BL Number', null as 'BL Date', null as 'GRPO Number', null as 'GRPO Date', null as 'Total GR', null as 'Consignee', null as 'Invoice Number', null as 'Invoice Date', null as 'Invoice Currency', null as 'Total Invoice', TY.DocNum as 'CN Number', TY.DocDate as 'CN Date', TY.NumAtCard as 'CN Reference', TY.DocTotal as 'Total CN', Tz.Number_Payment as 'Payment Number', Tz.InvoiceId as 'Sequence', Tz.DocDate 'Payment Date', TZ.BcgSum as'Bank Charges', TZ.PaidSum as 'Total Payment', (TY.DocTotal-TY.PaidToDate) as 'Balance Due' from ORPC as TY left join (select H.DocNum as 'Number_Payment', H.DocDate, H.DocTotal, H.BcgSum, D.DocNum, D.InvoiceId, D.DocEntry, D.InvType, H.ObjType, D.SumApplied, D.PaidSum from OVPM as H join VPM2 as D on H.DocEntry = D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as TZ on TY.DocEntry = TZ.DocEntry and TY.ObjType = TZ.InvType where TY.CANCELED='N' ) as ZZ where :1 between ':2' and ':3' and :6 = :7 and ZZ.[Supplier Code] = :5 and (ZZ.[Consignee] = ':8' or ':8' is null or ':8' = '') order by ZZ.[Supplier Code],ZZ.[Payment Number], ZZ.[Sequence] asc

ExpSyntax.val: CASE({0,29}, 'OPOR','ZZ.[PO Date]', 'OPDN','ZZ.[GRPO Date]', 'OPBL','ZZ.[BL Date]', 'OPCH','ZZ.[Invoice Date]', 'ORPC','ZZ.[CN Date]', 'OVPM','ZZ.[Payment Date]', 'ZZ.[Payment Date]')

CASE({0,29}, 'OPOR','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[PO Number])', 'OPDN','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[GRPO Number])', 'OPBL','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[BL Number])', 'OPCH','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[Invoice Number])', 'ORPC','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[CN Number])', 'OVPM','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[Payment Number])', 'convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[Payment Number])')

IF({0,34}='',
CASE({0,29}, 'OPOR','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[PO Number])', 'OPDN','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[GRPO Number])', 'OPBL','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[BL Number])', 'OPCH','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[Invoice Number])', 'ORPC','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[CN Number])', 'OVPM','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[Payment Number])', 'convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[Payment Number])')
,ASCIIChr(39)&Trim({0,34})&ASCIIChr(39))

SQL_STMT_U.val: select ROW_NUMBER () over (partition by [PO Number] order by [Supplier Code] , [PO Number]) Urut,* from (select case when T0.DocNum is not null then concat('PO-',T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT,'-',cast(T0.DocNum as varchar(10))) else null end as 'PO Number', T0.DocDate as 'PO Date', T0.CardCode as 'Supplier Code', T0.CardName as 'Supplier Name', T0.DocCur as 'Currency', T0.DocTotal as 'Total PO', TA.NumAtCard as 'BL Number', TA.DocDate as 'BL Date', T3.DocNum as 'GRPO Number', T3.DocDate as 'GRPO Date', T3.DocTotal as 'Total GR', TX.U_IDU_Kode_PT as 'Consignee', case when TX.DocNum is not null then concat('INV-',T0.U_IDU_Kode_PT,'-',cast(TX.DocNum as varchar(10))) else null end as 'Invoice Number', TX.DocDate as 'Invoice Date', TX.DocCur as 'Invoice Currency', TX.DocTotal as 'Total Invoice', TY.DocNum as 'CN Number', TY.DocDate as 'CN Date', TY.NumAtCard as 'CN Reference', TY.DocTotal as 'Total CN', Tz.Number_Payment as 'Payment Number', Tz.InvoiceId as 'Sequence', Tz.DocDate as 'Payment Date', TZ.BcgSum as'Bank Charges', TZ.PaidSum as 'Total Payment', (Tx.DocTotal - Tx.PaidToDate) as 'Balance Due' from OPOR as T0 left join (select distinct T1.BaseEntry, T1.DocEntry, T2.ObjType, T2.DocNum, T2.DocDate, T2.NumAtCard, T2.CANCELED, T2.LetterNum from PBL1 as T1 join OPBL as T2 on T1.DocEntry = T2.DocEntry) as TA on T0.DocEntry = TA.BaseEntry and TA.CANCELED = 'N' join TX_DOCREF as TB on TA.DocEntry = TB.BaseEntry and TA.ObjType = TB.BaseType join OPDN as T3 on T3.DocEntry = TB.DocEntry and T3.ObjType = TB.DocType and T3.CANCELED = 'N' right join (select B.BaseEntry, B.BaseType, A.DocEntry, A.ObjType, A.U_IDU_Kode_PT,A.DocNum, A.DocDate, A.DocCur, A.DocTotal, A.PaidToDate from OPCH as A join TX_DOCREF as B on A.DocEntry = B.DocEntry and A.ObjType = B.DocType and A.CANCELED = 'N') as TX on T3.DocEntry = TX.BaseEntry and T3.ObjType = TX.BaseType left join (select B.BaseEntry, B.BaseType, A.DocNum, A.DocEntry, A.ObjType, A.DocDate, A.NumAtCard,A.DocCur, A.DocTotal from ORPC as A join TX_DOCREF as B on A.DocEntry = B.DocEntry and A.ObjType = B.DocType and A.CANCELED = 'N') as TY on TX.DocEntry = TY.BaseEntry and TX.ObjType = TY.BaseType left join (select H.DocNum as 'Number_Payment', H.DocDate, H.DocTotal, H.BcgSum, D.DocNum, D.InvoiceId, D.DocEntry, D.InvType, D.ObjType, D.SumApplied, D.PaidSum from OVPM as H join VPM2 as D on H.DocEntry = D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as TZ on TX.DocEntry = TZ.DocEntry and TX.ObjType = TZ.InvType where T0.CANCELED='N' AND TA.NumAtCard=:4 union select null as 'PO Number', null as 'PO Date', TY.CardCode as 'Supplier Code', TY.CardName as 'Supplier Name', null as 'PO Currency', null as 'Total PO', null as 'BL Number', null as 'BL Date', null as 'GRPO Number', null as 'GRPO Date', null as 'Total GR', null as 'Consignee', null as 'Invoice Number', null as 'Invoice Date', null as 'Invoice Currency', null as 'Total Invoice', TY.DocNum as 'CN Number', TY.DocDate as 'CN Date', TY.NumAtCard as 'CN Reference', TY.DocTotal as 'Total CN', Tz.Number_Payment as 'Payment Number', Tz.InvoiceId as 'Sequence', Tz.DocDate 'Payment Date', TZ.BcgSum as'Bank Charges', TZ.PaidSum as 'Total Payment', (TY.DocTotal-TY.PaidToDate) as 'Balance Due' from ORPC as TY left join (select H.DocNum as 'Number_Payment', H.DocDate, H.DocTotal, H.BcgSum, D.DocNum, D.InvoiceId, D.DocEntry, D.InvType, H.ObjType, D.SumApplied, D.PaidSum from OVPM as H join VPM2 as D on H.DocEntry = D.DocNum and H.Canceled='N') as TZ on TY.DocEntry = TZ.DocEntry and TY.ObjType = TZ.InvType where TY.CANCELED='N' ) as ZZ where :1 between ':2' and ':3' and :6 = :7 and ZZ.[Supplier Code] = :5 order by ZZ.[Supplier Code],ZZ.[Payment Number], ZZ.[Sequence] asc

ExpSyntax.val: CASE({0,29}, 'OPOR','ZZ.[PO Date]', 'OPDN','ZZ.[GRPO Date]', 'OPBL','ZZ.[BL Date]', 'OPCH','ZZ.[Invoice Date]', 'ORPC','ZZ.[CN Date]', 'OVPM','ZZ.[Payment Date]', 'ZZ.[Payment Date]')

CASE({0,29}, 'OPOR','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[PO Number])', 'OPDN','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[GRPO Number])', 'OPBL','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[BL Number])', 'OPCH','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[Invoice Number])', 'ORPC','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[CN Number])', 'OVPM','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[Payment Number])', 'convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[Payment Number])')

IF({0,36}='',
CASE({0,29}, 'OPOR','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[PO Number])', 'OPDN','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[GRPO Number])', 'OPBL','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[BL Number])', 'OPCH','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[Invoice Number])', 'ORPC','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[CN Number])', 'OVPM','convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[Payment Number])', 'convert(varchar(10),ZZ.[Payment Number])')
,ASCIIChr(39)&Trim({0,36})&ASCIIChr(39))
CASE({0,29}, 'OPOR','Purchase Order', 'OPDN','Puchase Receipt', 'OPBL','BL', 'OPCH','A/P Invoice', 'ORPC','A/P CN', 'OVPM','Outgoing Payment','')
